thread.title: Virginia
thread.title_full: Matboard and More reviewed by Virginia

author: Virginia
title: Virginia
text: I was looking to order mats to create a gallery wall. I had been collecting different sized frames over the years and didn't want to spend a fortune on mat board. I found matboards and more, and all I had to do was measure the inside of the frames and what size photos I wanted for the cut outs. I put in my measurements and got everything within a week. Perfect condition and perfect fit!
